headline: Assessing Caterpillar (CAT) Valuation After Powerful Short And Long Term Share Price Gains
summary: Caterpillar (CAT) is back on many investors’ radars after a strong share price move over the past month, with the stock up about 21%, and roughly 36% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Caterpillar. The recent 21.2% 1 month share price return and 35.8% 3 month share price return sit within a much stronger backdrop, with Caterpillar posting a 1 year total shareholder return of 126.5% and a 5 year total shareholder return of 285.9%. That kind of long run compounding, alongside a...
